geolocation.ERROR_MESSAGE: We are not able to locate your position, this might affect some features of the application.
geolocation.PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE: It seems you did not give permission to locate you.
geolocation.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE: It seems the internal source of position returned an internal error.
geolocation.POSITION_TIMEOUT_MESSAGE: It seems the time allowed to acquire it was reached before the information was obtained.

activity.REMOVE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove {{layer}} from your workspace ?
